cause.description:
So many people has been affected by cancer, either knowing a loved one, or being one affected. This is your chance to help even just a little bit
Relay for Life is to honor cancer survivors, to pay tribute to those who we have lost, and to raise money to help find a cure.
http://www.relayforlife.org/relay/
1. Fight back
2. Remember
cause.mission: raise money to help find a cure for cancer
cause.name: Relay For Life 2007- New England
